titlestmt.titleproper:
Guide to the Charles M. Lefferts Collection
circa 1896-1921
MS 3112
titlestmt.author: Elise Winks

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-04-12 14:17:09 -0400.

did.abstract: Materials collected by Lefferts regarding historical militaries. Includes illustrations of and notes on British, American, and Hessian army uniforms; Civil War atlases and campaign blueprints; and correspondence.
did.langmaterial: The documents in the collection are in English.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: The collection should be cited as: Charles M. Lefferts collection, MS 3112, New-York Historical Society.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 7 boxes: 1. British army uniforms (cards—illustrations) 2. Notes, British army 3. US Army uniforms (cards—illustrations) 4. Notes, US army, Hessians, etc 5. Correspondence 6. Civil War campaign blueprints 7. Civil War atlases Plus 28 published volumes
